Posts.Content:
hi there i am new on these boards and need some advice about tamoxifen as i am suffering from pains in my joints and i have been told they will settle down.  Is they anyone else out there that is suffering like me. 
 sheldon x
Posts.Title: side effects of tamoxifen

Posts.Content: my friend mum has grade 3 cancer could you please give me any advice information as she is very scared at the moment . I feel that this may be a comfort to her as she as no knowledge at what is happening to her mum at the moment and is very tired and not eating also.
Posts.Title: can you help

Posts.Content: hi my name is michelle I am 36 yrs dx in july stage 2 no lymph nodes involved mast and recon no chemo or rads now on tamoxifen. I live in the uk and have a very supportive partner and 3 girls age 11 8 and 2.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
